description: This file implements decompression functions for various algorithms including out, deflate, v42bis, zlib, and gzip within a cryptography framework in the ANSC project. It contains code for decompression and related utility functions, with some platform-specific and optional features controlled via macros.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoDecompress(ULONG algorithm,PVOID compact,ULONG size,PVOID plain,PULONG pOutSize)
methods.description: Performs decompression based on the specified algorithm type, calling appropriate decompression functions.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoOutDecompress(PVOID compact,ULONG size,PVOID plain,PULONG pOutSize)
methods.description: Stub for out decompression, returning the input size.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoDeflateDecompress(PVOID compact,ULONG size,PVOID plain,PULONG pOutSize)
methods.description: Stub for deflate decompression, returning the input size.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoLzsDecompress(PVOID compact,ULONG size,PVOID plain,PULONG pOutSize)
methods.description: Performs LZS decompression using dynamic memory allocation and specific decompression routines, with memory cleanup.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoV42bisDecompress(PVOID compact,ULONG size,PVOID plain,PULONG pOutSize)
methods.description: Stub for v42bis decompression, returning the input size.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoZlibDecompress(PVOID compact,ULONG size,PVOID plain,PULONG pOutSize)
methods.description: Uses zlib's uncompress function to decompress data, with error checking.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoGzipDecompress(PVOID compact,ULONG size,PVOID plain,PULONG pOutSize)
methods.description: Decompresses gzip data if supported; performs validation and uses gzip-specific functions.
